data.name: C_AddFolder_AutoRemove.Content
data.value: Automatically remove books from the library (including notes, highlights, etc) when files are deleted from the folder
data.comment: Automatically remove books from the library (including notes, highlights, etc) when files are deleted from the folder

data.name: C_AddFolder_SyncFolder.Content
data.value: Sync this folder and automatically add new books
data.comment: Sync this folder and automatically add new books

data.name: C_Backup_Config.Description
data.value: Select the configuration for backup or restore operation
data.comment: Select the configuration for backup or restore operation

data.name: C_Backup_Operation.Description
data.value: Select the operation you want to perform
data.comment: Select the operation you want to perform

data.name: C_Backup_Storage.Description
data.value: Select the source or target storage for the operation
data.comment: Select the source or target storage for the operation

data.name: C_General_BookTitle.Description
data.value: Display title for all books in the library view
data.comment: Display title for all books in the library view

data.name: C_General_Lang.Description
data.value: Buttons, menus and other controls will show in this language. This setting will be applied on the next start of the app.
data.comment: Buttons, menus and other controls will show in this language. This setting will be applied on the next start of the app.

data.name: C_Reader_AutoLayout.Description
data.value: In 2-column layout when device rotates to portrait mode, reader will auto switch to 1-column layout, and vice versa
data.comment: In 2-column layout when device rotates to portrait mode, reader will auto switch to 1-column layout, and vice versa

data.name: C_Reader_AutoScroll.Description
data.value: Auto scrolls the page to follow the sentence being read in the ReadAloud mode
data.comment: Auto scrolls the page to follow the sentence being read in the ReadAloud mode

data.name: C_Reader_BookFont.Description
data.value: Reader uses the original fonts packaged with the book
data.comment: Reader uses the original fonts packaged with the book

data.name: C_Reader_EnhRender.Description
data.value: Improves the format/layout in which books are rendered for reading
data.comment: Improves the format/layout in which books are rendered for reading

data.name: C_Reader_SearchEngine.Description
data.value: Search engine to use for web search
data.comment: Search engine to use for web search

data.name: C_Reader_StdMrgn.Description
data.value: Overrides any margin specified in the book to provide consistent layout in the reader
data.comment: Overrides any margin specified in the book to provide consistent layout in the reader

data.name: C_Reader_TextAlign.Description
data.value: Overrides any text alignment preference set in the book to provide consistent layout in the reader
data.comment: Overrides any text alignment preference set in the book to provide consistent layout in the reader

data.name: EBI_Msg1.Text
data.value: • (s) - Use semi-colon ( ; ) to separate multiple entries.
data.comment: • (s) - Use semi-colon ( ; ) to separate multiple entries.

data.comment: Would you spare a moment to rate us on the store?

data.value: Would you like to share some feedback with us?
data.comment: Would you like to share some feedback with us?

data.comment: Looks like you already have an active subscription, make sure to cancel it to avoid additional billing.

data.value: Title length can be up-to 100 chars
data.comment: Title length can be up-to 100 chars

data.comment: To remove Ads and get additional features, click here.

data.comment: Are you sure you want to clear all statistics?

data.name: S_B_OnlineBookContent1
data.value: Select the website from where you want to download the eBook. [1/4]
data.comment: Select the website from where you want to download the eBook. [1/4]

data.name: S_B_OnlineBookContent2
data.value: Browse the catalog and click on any eBook download link. App will download the book and add it to the library. [2/4]
data.comment: Browse the catalog and click on any eBook download link. App will download the book and add it to the library. [2/4]

data.name: S_B_OnlineBookContent4
data.value: Add your own website from where you want to download eBooks. [4/4]
data.comment: Add your own website from where you want to download eBooks. [4/4]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent1
data.value: Tap on the edges of the screen, swipe the page, use ← / → keyboard keys or use mouse scroll wheel, to go to next or previous page. [1/8]
data.comment: Tap on the edges of the screen, swipe the page, use ← / → keyboard keys or use mouse scroll wheel, to go to next or previous page. [1/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent2
data.value: Select text or right click on any word to open the Reader context menu. You can add note, highlight or bookmark from here. [2/8]
data.comment: Select text or right click on any word to open the Reader context menu. You can add note, highlight or bookmark from here. [2/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent3
data.value: Access the table of contents of the book from here. [3/8]
data.comment: Access the table of contents of the book from here. [3/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent4
data.value: Your notes and highlights would be listed here. [4/8]
data.comment: Your notes and highlights would be listed here. [4/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent6
data.value: Search in the current chapter or the entire book. [6/8]
data.comment: Search in the current chapter or the entire book. [6/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent7
data.value: You can use this to read aloud the book contents (text-to-speech). [7/8]
data.comment: You can use this to read aloud the book contents (text-to-speech). [7/8]

data.name: S_B_TutReaderContent8
data.value: You can configure the page layout, style, color scheme, etc. from here. [8/8]
data.comment: You can configure the page layout, style, color scheme, etc. from here. [8/8]

data.name: S_BookSystemLimitError_Msg
data.value: Cannot add more books as the system limit has been reached. Consider removing individually added book files and use 'Add Folder' option to add books in bulk.
data.comment: Cannot add more books as the system limit has been reached. Consider removing individually added book files and use 'Add Folder' option to add books in bulk.

data.name: S_DownloadBook_Msg
data.value: Do you want to download this book and add to library?
data.comment: Do you want to download this book and add to library?

data.name: S_ErrMsg1
data.value: Aquile Reader does not have permission to access the book file - {0}. Click 'Grant Permission' and select the same book file in the file picker window.
data.comment: Aquile Reader does not have permission to access the book file - {0}. Click 'Grant Permission' and select the same book file in the file picker window.

data.name: S_ErrMsg2
data.value: The file you are trying to open, no longer exists. Please check and try again.
data.comment: The file you are trying to open, no longer exists. Please check and try again.

data.name: S_ErrMsg3
data.value: The file may be in use, locked, or you don't have sufficient permissions.
data.comment: The file may be in use, locked, or you don't have sufficient permissions.

data.name: S_ErrMsg4
data.value: Selected File is different from the original book file - {0}.
data.comment: Selected File is different from the original book file - {0}.

data.name: S_ErrMsg6
data.value: If the problem persists please contact support.
data.comment: If the problem persists please contact support.

data.name: S_FileCountLimitMsg
data.value: Adding large number of individual book files can hit system limit, thus preventing new book from being added. Use 'Add Folder' option to add book files in bulk.
data.comment: Adding large number of individual book files can hit system limit, thus preventing new book from being added. Use 'Add Folder' option to add book files in bulk.

data.name: S_HighNotes_Msg1
data.value: Selected content should not include the white spaces from header or footer. Please re-select.
data.comment: Selected content should not include the white spaces from header or footer. Please re-select.

data.name: S_HighNotesMsg1
data.value: Highlight cannot be added while search pane is open.
data.comment: Highlight cannot be added while search pane is open.

data.value: Selected text for Highlight and Note cannot overlap.
data.comment: Selected text for Highlight and Note cannot overlap.

data.value: Minimum 1 character must be selected for highlight.
data.comment: Minimum 1 character must be selected for highlight.

data.value: Maximum 4000 characters can be selected for highlight.
data.comment: Maximum 4000 characters can be selected for highlight.

data.comment: Note cannot be added while search pane is open.

data.value: Selected text for Note and Highlight cannot overlap.
data.comment: Selected text for Note and Highlight cannot overlap.

data.comment: Minimum 1 character must be selected for adding note.

data.name: S_HighNotesMsg8
data.value: Maximum 4000 characters can be selected for adding note.
data.comment: Maximum 4000 characters can be selected for adding note.

data.comment: Download of files other than .epub is not supported

data.comment: Apologies! Looks like you already own this, we have updated our records to reflect this correctly.

data.comment: Sorry! Looks like the transaction was canceled, plz try again.

data.comment: Sorry! Looks like the purchase failed due to network issues, plz try again.

data.comment: Sorry! Looks like the purchase failed due to some server error, plz try again.

data.comment: Sorry! Something went wrong during the purchase, plz try again.

data.comment: Table of Contents is still loading...

data.comment: Add a book to get started

data.name: T_Backup_Bkp.Text

data.comment: Create a backup copy with the selected configurations.

data.name: T_Backup_Restore.Text
data.value: Restore the selected configurations from the backup file. Note: This will override current configurations, e.g. new notes, highlights etc can be lost if they are not contained in the backup copy.
data.comment: Restore the selected configurations from the backup file. Note: This will override current configurations, e.g. new notes, highlights etc can be lost if they are not contained in the backup copy.
